item.title: John I did some "networking" tonight. Was it an A+? No. B? No. Riding that fine line between C- and D+? Yes! And that is wildly better than my typical efforts, which generally involve a wooden bridge, a can of gasoline, and a match.
item.description: I did some "networking" tonight. Was it an A+? No. B? No. Riding that fine line between C- and D+? Yes! And that is wildly better than my typical efforts, which generally involve a wooden bridge, a can of gasoline, and a match.
item.author: John Chilton
item.dc:creator: John Chilton

item.title: John Contemplating logging into Alyssa's account and posting a complaint about English beer. I would ask pocket Alyssa if that is acceptable but she is biased.

item.title: John SVN statistics show that Thursdays are my most productive day. Unfortunately, I have been wasting all day working on a grant we will not get. Oh well. :(.
item.description: SVN statistics show that Thursdays are my most productive day. Unfortunately, I have been wasting all day working on a grant we will not get. Oh well. :(.
item.author: John Chilton

item.title: John Just over heard that we didn't get any of the grants we applied for. That is a punch in the face. I should maybe start looking for a new job.
item.description: Just over heard that we didn't get any of the grants we applied for. That is a punch in the face. I should maybe start looking for a new job.
item.author: John Chilton
item.dc:creator: John Chilton

item.title: John I am well on the record as stating I would manipulate the bits on my hard drive with with a magnet before using Word to create a document, but today I put together a diagram with PowerPoint for the first time and I think it turned out pretty well. Way to go PowerPoint.
item.description: I am well on the record as stating I would manipulate the bits on my hard drive with with a magnet before using Word to create a document, but today I put together a diagram with PowerPoint for the first time and I think it turned out pretty well. Way to go PowerPoint.

item.title: John Thanks for the birthday wishes yesterday everyone. I had a great day.
